channel.title: Variable Locations
channel.description:
Hey i need help with some Variable Locations
and i was wondering if Miss Silab or Mod Tahrok or Lothy cauld help me or if you know where they are and your smart then you cauld help me.
Ohk i wish to know where the the variable victim is, it is used as: [code]sendQuest("+playerName+ owned +victim+");[/code] or [code]sendQuest("+playerName+ made +victim+ a mod");[/code] now victim doesn't necessarily be a victim lol it is used for if someone does somthing to a player it used +victim+
I have tried heaps of combo's like +client.victim+ and +Player.victim+ i just dont know where it is...

item.title: Variable Locations
item.dc:creator: @danny89 danny89
item.description:
@danny89 wrote:

It should be somewhere above what your looking at, but I could be wrong.

Read full topic

find int victim I would guess, cause thats basically a variable in java.

Hey i need help with some Variable Locations

and i was wondering if Miss Silab or Mod Tahrok or Lothy cauld

me.

now victim doesn’t necessarily be a victim lol it is used for if someone does somthing to a player it used +victim+
